name: Music Store Simulator Prologue
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2000160/Music_Store_Simulator/



Welcome to the free sample of our game! Music Store Simulator Prologue! In this immersive experience, you get to be the mastermind behind a successful musical instrument manufacturing company.

In Music Store Simulator Prologue, you can create, sell, and earn while constantly improving and developing your business. Your customers will come to you with their dream musical instrument requests, and it's up to you to make their dreams a reality. From the assembly work, to painting and configuration, you'll be in charge of the entire process. As you exceed your customers' expectations, your reputation will grow, and more customers will be lining up to place orders with you.



With every successful order, you'll earn profits that can be reinvested to buy more advanced tools and unlock additional rooms to expand your atelier. As you improve the quality of your musical instruments, you'll have the opportunity to produce your own unique instruments, add them to your private collection, and even sell them online.

In Music Store Simulator Prologue, your success depends on your skill level and experience with different materials and don't forget to keep your warehouse stocked with the parts, paintings, glues, and tools you need to keep production going. Your tools will get old over time, so be sure to invest in better equipment and work tables to speed up procedures and reduce production time.



As you grow your brand, you'll have the chance to expand your business by launching advertising campaigns and producing musical instruments in different countries. With the right strategy and financial management, you'll be able to open branches all over the world and become a worldwide musical instruments producer.

In the Music Store Simulator Prologue, the possibilities are endless. Are you ready to take on the challenge of building a successful musical instrument manufacturing company? Get started today and unleash your creativity!

Features

  • Graphic design and modelling aimed to reproduce accurately all the details of the musical instruments.
  • 2 Electric Guitars to create.
  • More than 50 pieces to use, all customizable in materials and finishing.
  • Production of instruments based on specific orders of customers from all over the world.
  • Typical production steps: joint, screwing, gluing.
  • Realistic timing: painting and glue drying requires different processing times (in the meanwhile will have to progress on other orders).
  • Warehouse management of pieces, paintings, glues and tools.
  • Opportunity to play the musical instruments you created (of course after tuning them!).
